resources.string: You will see a sequence of 60 words. For the first 20, try to identify the color used to display each word.
Good luck, and try to be as quick as possible!
You have picked with medium accuracy. On your next attempt, try to select the correct answers

We are going to ask you eight questions. You will see three options (yes, no, not sure). There is no time limitation. You can take the Test yourself or read the questions out loud to a family member. AD8 can detect early cognitive changes associated with many common dementias. It is essential to see your doctor if the score results indicate cognitive impairment.
